Title: Lamb shift measurement of antihydrogen for determining the charge radius of antiproton and a stringent test of CPT symmetry
Abstract: Synopsis Measurements of Lamb shift in antihydrogen atom have been planned to extract the antiproton charge radius which has never been experimentally investigated. A hyperfine spin filter and a microwave cavity can be employed.
